# 100 Wellington - Cornice Flashing Replacement Solicitation

## Solicitation Details
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4348402130
* **Publication Date**: December 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 18, 2024, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 15, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: April 8, 2024

## Procurement Description
The contractor is responsible for removing old copper flashing, drain covers, and scuppers at the 100 Wellington building, as per the plans and specifications. This project requires the supply and installation of new copper flashing, drain, and scuppers.

## Contract Value and Delivery Information
* **Contract Value**: To be determined
* **Delivery Location**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Delivery Address**: 100 Wellington, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

## Requirements and Evaluation
* **Technical Requirements**: Contractors must have relevant experience in roofing and siding, and meet the required technical qualifications listed in the solicitation documents.
* **Evaluation Criteria**: The lowest bidder will be selected based on the evaluation of their technical and financial proposal.
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Administrative Information
* **Contact**: Lisa Hampel, lisahampel@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Solicitation Documents**: Available at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18246193
* **Trade Agreements**: This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
